name: recommendations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: This API endpoint returns the average of all analyst recommendations and classifies them as Strong Buy, Buy, Hold, or Sell. Also, it returns a recommendation score.

Availability: Mega plan
Data weighting: 100 API credits per symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol to get recommendations for.

exchange.description: Filter recommendations by exchange name or mic code.

country.description: Filter recommendations by country name or alpha code.
